    {
        Configure();

    private void Configure()
    {
        AddAotType<global::GraphQL.Types.AutoRegisteringObjectGraphType<StarWarsQuery>, StarWarsQuery>();
        AddAotType<global::GraphQL.Types.IntGraphType>();
        AddAotType<global::GraphQL.Types.StringGraphType>();

        RegisterType(typeof(global::GraphQL.Types.AutoRegisteringObjectGraphType<StarWarsQuery>));
        RegisterType(typeof(global::GraphQL.Types.IntGraphType));
        RegisterType(typeof(global::GraphQL.Types.StringGraphType));

        RegisterTypeMapping(typeof(int), typeof(global::GraphQL.Types.IntGraphType));
        RegisterTypeMapping(typeof(string), typeof(global::GraphQL.Types.StringGraphType));

        Query = GetRequiredService<global::GraphQL.Types.AutoRegisteringObjectGraphType<StarWarsQuery>>();

        {
            var converter = new global::GraphQL.Conversion.ListConverter(typeof(int), values => global::System.Array.ConvertAll(values, value => (int?)value ?? default));
            _listConverters[typeof(int[])] = converter;
            _listConverters[typeof(global::System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<int>)] = converter;
            _listConverters[typeof(global::System.Collections.Generic.IList<int>)] = converter;
            _listConverters[typeof(global::System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<int>)] = converter;
            _listConverters[typeof(global::System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection<int>)] = converter;
            _listConverters[typeof(global::System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList<int>)] = converter;

        {
            var converter = new global::GraphQL.Conversion.ListConverter(typeof(int?), values => global::System.Array.ConvertAll(values, value => (int?)value));

            _listConverters[typeof(global::System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection<string?>)] = converter;
            _listConverters[typeof(global::System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList<string?>)] = converter;

        {
            var converter = new global::GraphQL.Conversion.ListConverter(typeof(int), values => global::System.Array.ConvertAll(values, value => (int?)value ?? default));
            _listConverters[typeof(global::System.Collections.Generic.HashSet<int>)] = converter;
            _listConverters[typeof(global::System.Collections.Generic.ISet<int>)] = converter;

            var converter = new global::GraphQL.Conversion.ListConverter(typeof(int?), values => global::System.Array.ConvertAll(values, value => (int?)value));

            _listConverters[typeof(global::System.Collections.Generic.ISet<string?>)] = converter;

        {
            ValueConverter.RegisterListConverterFactory(listType, this);
        }
    }

    private readonly global::System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<global::System.Type, global::GraphQL.Conversion.IListConverter> _listConverters = new();

    public global::GraphQL.Conversion.IListConverter Create(global::System.Type listType)
    {
        return _listConverters[listType];
    }
